GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
RDMA/hfi1: Fix potential integer multiplication overflow errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 31dca00d0cc9f4133320d72eb7e3720badc6d6e6, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 7724105686e718ac476a6ad3304fea2fbcfcffde. For more details please see the references link.
